channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: School slow down sign is no longer illuminating, 23rd January
item.description:
School slow down sign on Hewlett Road is no longer illuminating
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 145, Hewlett Road, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Resident leaving large items on pavement, 23rd January
item.description:
Resident at number 6 continues to add to items on pavement which she hopes people will take away for free. No one is taking. Items are both unsightly and blocking pavement. As of 23/01/26 there is a desk and two sets of drawers. Other residents are finding her uncommunicative when they ask her to move/dispose of items. Items are now all wet and unlikely to be desirable.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 18, Aysgarth Avenue, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
